### My impact, my ambition

In this breakout we would like you to discuss and note down (on the provided Post-Its):

1) Discuss the main impact activity you are engaging in and/or the main impact your research has had/is having.

2) In a second step, discuss the type of impact you would like your research to have. Please post the note on the provided wall according to impact type and stake holder.
